short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revia is an AI Call assistant. Make calls with Revia with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make calls with Revia with a click, let Revia the AI assistant handle calls for you.

Extension Features:
- Make phone numbers on websites callable via Revia by clicking on them.
- Works only for US numbers now.
